title: Examples of normed complex vector spaces

blocks.name: cnnv
blocks.content: The set of complex numbers is a normed complex vector space. The vector operation is ` + ` , the scalar product is ` x. ` , and the norm function is ` abs ` . (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 3-Dec-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnnv(class c0) {
  |- wcel(c0, cnv)
  -| wceq(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs))
} = {
  isnvi(hs0, hs1, c0, cc, caddc, nat0, cmul, cabs)
  grporn(cc, caddc)
  ax-mp(wcel(caddc, cgr), wcel(caddc, cablo))
  cnaddabloOLD()
  ablogrpo(caddc)
  fdmi(caddc, cxp(cc, cc), cc)
  ax-addf()
  cnidOLD()
  cncvcOLD()
  absf()
  biimpa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), nat0), wceq(cv(hs0), nat0))
  abs00(cv(hs0))
  absmul(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  abstri(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.c(caddc)
  diff.hs0.c(cmul)
  diff.hs0.c(cabs)
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs1.c(caddc)
  diff.hs1.c(cmul)
  diff.hs1.c(cabs)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cnnv(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 ‚àà NrmCVec
  ‚ä£ c0 = < < +, √ó >, abs >
} = {
  isnvi(hs0, hs1, c0, cc, caddc, nat0, cmul, cabs)
  grporn(cc, caddc)
  ax-mp(+ ‚àà GrpOp, + ‚àà AbelOp)
  cnaddabloOLD()
  ablogrpo(caddc)
  fdmi(caddc, (‚ÑÇ √ó ‚ÑÇ), cc)
  ax-addf()
  cnidOLD()
  cncvcOLD()
  absf()
  biimpa(hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, (abs ` hs0)= 0, hs0 = 0)
  abs00(hs0)
  absmul(hs1, hs0)
  abstri(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.c(caddc)
  diff.hs0.c(cmul)
  diff.hs0.c(cabs)
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs1.c(caddc)
  diff.hs1.c(cmul)
  diff.hs1.c(cabs)
}

blocks.name: cnnvg
blocks.content: The vector addition (group) operation of the normed complex vector space of complex numbers. (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnnvg(class c0) {
  |- wceq(caddc, cfv(cpv, c0))
  -| wceq(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs))
} = {
  3eqtrri(caddc, cfv(cpv, c0), cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, c0)), cfv(c1st, cop(caddc, cmul)))
  vafval(cfv(cpv, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cpv, c0))
  fveq2i(c1st, cfv(c1st, c0), cop(caddc, cmul))
  eqtri(cfv(c1st, c0), cop(caddc, cmul), cfv(c1st, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs)))
  fveq2i(c1st, c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs))
  op1st(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs)
  opex(caddc, cmul)
  mp2an(wcel(cabs, universe), wf(cabs, cc, cr), wcel(cc, universe))
  absf()
  cnex()
  fex(cabs, cc, cr, universe)
  op1st(caddc, cmul)
  addex()
  mulex()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cnnvg(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ + =(+v ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c0 = < < +, √ó >, abs >
} = {
  3eqtrri(caddc, (+v ` c0), (1st `(1st ` c0)), (1st ` < +, √ó >))
  vafval((+v ` c0), c0)
  eqid((+v ` c0))
  fveq2i(c1st, (1st ` c0), < +, √ó >)
  eqtri((1st ` c0), < +, √ó >, (1st ` < < +, √ó >, abs >))
  fveq2i(c1st, c0, < < +, √ó >, abs >)
  op1st(< +, √ó >, cabs)
  opex(caddc, cmul)
  mp2an(abs ‚àà ùïå, (abs : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚Ñù), ‚ÑÇ ‚àà ùïå)
  absf()
  cnex()
  fex(cabs, cc, cr, universe)
  op1st(caddc, cmul)
  addex()
  mulex()
}

blocks.name: cnnvba
blocks.content: The base set of the normed complex vector space of complex numbers. (Contributed by NM, 7-Nov-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnnvba(class c0) {
  |- wceq(cc, cfv(cba, c0))
  -| wceq(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs))
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cc, cfv(cba, c0), crn(caddc), crn(cfv(cpv, c0)))
  rneqi(caddc, cfv(cpv, c0))
  cnnvg(c0)
  grporn(cc, caddc)
  ax-mp(wcel(caddc, cgr), wcel(caddc, cablo))
  cnaddabloOLD()
  ablogrpo(caddc)
  fdmi(caddc, cxp(cc, cc), cc)
  ax-addf()
  bafval(cfv(cba, c0), cfv(cpv, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cba, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cpv, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cnnvba(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ ‚ÑÇ =(BaseSet ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c0 = < < +, √ó >, abs >
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cc, (BaseSet ` c0), ran(+), ran((+v ` c0)))
  rneqi(caddc, (+v ` c0))
  cnnvg(c0)
  grporn(cc, caddc)
  ax-mp(+ ‚àà GrpOp, + ‚àà AbelOp)
  cnaddabloOLD()
  ablogrpo(caddc)
  fdmi(caddc, (‚ÑÇ √ó ‚ÑÇ), cc)
  ax-addf()
  bafval((BaseSet ` c0), (+v ` c0), c0)
  eqid((BaseSet ` c0))
  eqid((+v ` c0))
}

blocks.name: cnnvs
blocks.content: The scalar product operation of the normed complex vector space of complex numbers. (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnnvs(class c0) {
  |- wceq(cmul, cfv(cns, c0))
  -| wceq(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs))
} = {
  3eqtrri(cmul, cfv(cns, c0), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1st, c0)), cfv(c2nd, cop(caddc, cmul)))
  smfval(cfv(cns, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cns, c0))
  fveq2i(c2nd, cfv(c1st, c0), cop(caddc, cmul))
  eqtri(cfv(c1st, c0), cop(caddc, cmul), cfv(c1st, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs)))
  fveq2i(c1st, c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs))
  op1st(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs)
  opex(caddc, cmul)
  mp2an(wcel(cabs, universe), wf(cabs, cc, cr), wcel(cc, universe))
  absf()
  cnex()
  fex(cabs, cc, cr, universe)
  op2nd(caddc, cmul)
  addex()
  mulex()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cnnvs(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ √ó =(.sOLD ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c0 = < < +, √ó >, abs >
} = {
  3eqtrri(cmul, (.sOLD ` c0), (2nd `(1st ` c0)), (2nd ` < +, √ó >))
  smfval((.sOLD ` c0), c0)
  eqid((.sOLD ` c0))
  fveq2i(c2nd, (1st ` c0), < +, √ó >)
  eqtri((1st ` c0), < +, √ó >, (1st ` < < +, √ó >, abs >))
  fveq2i(c1st, c0, < < +, √ó >, abs >)
  op1st(< +, √ó >, cabs)
  opex(caddc, cmul)
  mp2an(abs ‚àà ùïå, (abs : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚Ñù), ‚ÑÇ ‚àà ùïå)
  absf()
  cnex()
  fex(cabs, cc, cr, universe)
  op2nd(caddc, cmul)
  addex()
  mulex()
}

blocks.name: cnnvnm
blocks.content: The norm operation of the normed complex vector space of complex numbers. (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnnvnm(class c0) {
  |- wceq(cabs, cfv(cnmcv, c0))
  -| wceq(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs))
} = {
  3eqtrri(cabs, cfv(cnmcv, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0), cfv(c2nd, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs)))
  nmcvfval(cfv(cnmcv, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cnmcv, c0))
  fveq2i(c2nd, c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs))
  op2nd(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs)
  opex(caddc, cmul)
  mp2an(wcel(cabs, universe), wf(cabs, cc, cr), wcel(cc, universe))
  absf()
  cnex()
  fex(cabs, cc, cr, universe)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cnnvnm(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ abs =(normCV ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c0 = < < +, √ó >, abs >
} = {
  3eqtrri(cabs, (normCV ` c0), (2nd ` c0), (2nd ` < < +, √ó >, abs >))
  nmcvfval((normCV ` c0), c0)
  eqid((normCV ` c0))
  fveq2i(c2nd, c0, < < +, √ó >, abs >)
  op2nd(< +, √ó >, cabs)
  opex(caddc, cmul)
  mp2an(abs ‚àà ùïå, (abs : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚Ñù), ‚ÑÇ ‚àà ùïå)
  absf()
  cnex()
  fex(cabs, cc, cr, universe)
}

blocks.name: cnnvm
blocks.content: The vector subtraction operation of the normed complex vector space of complex numbers. (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnnvm(class c0) {
  |- wceq(cmin, cfv(cnsb, c0))
  -| wceq(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs))
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cmin, cfv(cnsb, c0), cmpo(hs0, hs1, cc, cc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), cmpo(hs0, hs1, cc, cc, co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cv(hs1)))))
  mpt2eq3ia(hs0, hs1, cc, cc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cv(hs1))))
  eqtr2d(co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs0), caddc, cneg(cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)))
  oveq2d(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cv(hs1)), cneg(cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)))
  adantl(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cv(hs1)), cneg(cv(hs1))))
  mulm1(cv(hs1))
  negsub(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  mpbi(wceq(cmin, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cc, cc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1)))), wfn(cmin, cxp(cc, cc)))
  ax-mp(wfn(cmin, cxp(cc, cc)), wf(cmin, cxp(cc, cc), cc))
  subf()
  ffn(cmin, cxp(cc, cc), cc)
  fnov(hs0, hs1, cmin, cc, cc)
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cnsb, c0), cmpo(hs0, hs1, cc, cc, co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cv(hs1))))), wcel(c0, cnv))
  cnnv(c0)
  nvmfval(hs0, hs1, c0, cfv(cnsb, c0), cc, caddc, cmul)
  cnnvba(c0)
  cnnvg(c0)
  cnnvs(c0)
  eqid(cfv(cnsb, c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cmin)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs1.c(cmin)
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(caddc)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(caddc)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cnnvm(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ - =(-v ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c0 = < < +, √ó >, abs >
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cmin, (-v ` c0), (hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚Ü¶(hs0[-]hs1)), (hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚Ü¶(hs0[+](-u(1)[√ó]hs1))))
  mpt2eq3ia(hs0, hs1, cc, cc, (hs0[-]hs1), (hs0[+](-u(1)[√ó]hs1)))
  eqtr2d((hs0[-]hs1), (hs0[+](-u(1)[√ó]hs1)), (hs0[+]-u(hs1)), (hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ))
  oveq2d(hs0, caddc, (-u(1)[√ó]hs1), -u(hs1), (hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ))
  adantl(hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, (-u(1)[√ó]hs1)= -u(hs1))
  mulm1(hs1)
  negsub(hs0, hs1)
  mpbi(- =(hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚Ü¶(hs0[-]hs1)), -[Fn](‚ÑÇ √ó ‚ÑÇ))
  ax-mp(-[Fn](‚ÑÇ √ó ‚ÑÇ), (- :(‚ÑÇ √ó ‚ÑÇ)‚Üí ‚ÑÇ))
  subf()
  ffn(cmin, (‚ÑÇ √ó ‚ÑÇ), cc)
  fnov(hs0, hs1, cmin, cc, cc)
  ax-mp((-v ` c0)=(hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚Ü¶(hs0[+](-u(1)[√ó]hs1))), c0 ‚àà NrmCVec)
  cnnv(c0)
  nvmfval(hs0, hs1, c0, (-v ` c0), cc, caddc, cmul)
  cnnvba(c0)
  cnnvg(c0)
  cnnvs(c0)
  eqid((-v ` c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cmin)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs1.c(cmin)
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(caddc)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(caddc)
}

blocks.name: elimnv
blocks.content: Hypothesis elimination lemma for normed complex vector spaces to assist weak deduction theorem. (Contributed by NM, 16-May-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: elimnvu
blocks.content: Hypothesis elimination lemma for normed complex vector spaces to assist weak deduction theorem. (Contributed by NM, 16-May-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
